description:
Between the Swords their peaceful sceptres rear'd. Pope's Iliad, Book 7, Line 335'; N.B. This drawing was engraved.

Marks "Talehyhius, Ajax, Hector Eurybaes Between the Swords their peaceful sceptres rear'd. Iliad, Book 7" (card cat.)
markings: \'Talehyhius, Ajax, Hector, Eurybates, Between the Swords their peaceful sceptres rear\'d. Iliad, Book 7\'; \'JOHN FLAXMAN, R.A.\', on original (?) mat
medium: Pen and grey brown ink over graphite on white wove paper
provenance: [Scott and Fowles, New York; sold to MIA in 1923]
title: The Single Combat between Hector and Ajax
